title: Hamilton Grange National Memorial: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities. NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help! Donate If you would like to make a monetary contribution to Hamilton Grange National Memorial. Volunteer Do you enjoy working with people? Do you love history? Do you want to share the stories of our national heritage?If the answer to any of these questions is yes, here is an opportunity for you! Work With Us Keep an eye out for year-round and seasonal positions at Hamilton Grange National Memorial. The park posts all of its paid positions on USAJobs.gov but also posts internship and volunteer opportunities on our website.  Support Your Park Learn about how you can help support Hamilton Grange.
